lpoo.proj2.logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • lpoo.proj2.logic.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to represent the player character

      Return the box2d physics world
      void hang()
      Used to snap the player to a ledge and trigger a hanging animation, is called by the contact with a Climbable Tilemap tile
      boolean hasKey()
      Check if the player has the key
      boolean isAlive()
      Check if the player is alive
      boolean isFacingRight()
      Returns the side the player is facing
      void isKilled()
      Trigger the death of the player
      void jump()
      Function used to make the player jump goes into a standing long jump if the player is in a walking state and into a running jump if the player is running
      void pickUpKey()
      Used when the player picks up the key, updates the corresponding variable
      void run()
      Changes the player state to RUN or START_RUN, according to its current state
      void setPlayerSprite(PlayerSprite sprite) 
      void stop()
      Handles a stop in motion, acts according to the player state, with a running stop if the player was in quick motion, and a simple change to idle if not
      void turn()
      Used to trigger the "turn around" animation and update the facingRight boolean
      void update(float dt)
      Updates all the info of the player, the camera and its movement according to the state it is currently in.
      void walk()
      Handles movement when the hud "WALK" switch is activated

    • Method Detail

      • definePlayer

        public void definePlayer()
        Defines the player representation in the box2d physics world and sets its initial position

      • setPlayerSprite

        public void setPlayerSprite(PlayerSprite sprite)

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Updates all the info of the player, the camera and its movement according to the state it is currently in.
        Parameters:
        dt - time since last update

      • run

        public void run()
        Changes the player state to RUN or START_RUN, according to its current state

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Handles a stop in motion, acts according to the player state, with a running stop if the player was in quick motion, and a simple change to idle if not

      • jump

        public void jump()
        Function used to make the player jump goes into a standing long jump if the player is in a walking state and into a running jump if the player is running

      • walk

        public void walk()
        Handles movement when the hud "WALK" switch is activated

      • turn

        public void turn()
        Used to trigger the "turn around" animation and update the facingRight boolean

      • hang

        public void hang()
        Used to snap the player to a ledge and trigger a hanging animation, is called by the contact with a Climbable Tilemap tile

      • getPreviousState

        public Player.State getPreviousState()

      • getCurrentState

        Returns the current player state
        Returns:
        the current player state

      • isFacingRight

        public boolean isFacingRight()
        Returns the side the player is facing
        Returns:
        true if the player is facing right, false if facing left

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Check if the player is alive
        Returns:
        true if the player is alive, false if dead
